languages.text: {n}Сквозь шквал помех из вокс-передатчика пробивается голос Вигдис:{/n} "Авария застала их в своих каютах или во время исполнения служебных обязанностей. Сразу после аварийного совещания я вызову тех, кого вы запросите, на мостик в качестве эскорта".

{n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь шквал помех из вокс-передатчика пробивается голос Вигдис:{/n} "Авария застала их в своих каютах или во время исполнения служебных обязанностей. Сразу после аварийного совещания я вызову тех, кого вы запросите, на мостик в качестве эскорта".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

{n}Vigdis's voice comes through the barrage of static spewed by the vox-transmitter:{/n} "Communications to the deck where their quarters are located have been lost, as with most of the compartments. I will arrange for servo-skulls to be sent there from the main vox node to establish emergency lines of communication".

{n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

{n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-transmitter:{/n} "All contact with the deck on which their quarters are located has been lost, as well as with most of the compartments. I shall arrange for servo-skulls to be sent there from the main vox node in order to establish emergency lines of communication".

{n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

{n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

{n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

languages.text: {n}La voz de Vigdis atraviesa la constante estática que mana del voco amplificador:{/n} «Estaban en sus aposentos o llevando a cabo sus labores cuando ocurrió el incidente. Haré llamar al puente a quien usted pida para que sirvan de escoltas después de la reunión de emergencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Vigdis atraviesa la constante estática que mana del voco amplificador:{/n} «Estaban en sus aposentos o llevando a cabo sus labores cuando ocurrió el incidente. Haré llamar al puente a quien usted pida para que sirvan de escoltas después de la reunión de emergencia».

{n}La voz de Vigdis atraviesa la constante estática que mana del voco amplificador:{/n} «Hemos perdido todo contacto con la cubierta que contiene sus aposentos y la mayoría de los compartimentos. Enviaré servocráneos desde el nodo principal de vocos para establecer líneas de comunicación de emergencia».

languages.text: {n}音声通信送受信装置から噴出する雑音の中を突き抜けて、ヴィグディスの声が響く：{/n}「事件発生時、彼らは宿舎にいたか、職務を遂行しておりました。緊急会議の直後に、ご要望の者を護衛としてブリッジに召集します」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

traits.locale_text: {n}音声通信送受信装置から噴出する雑音の中を突き抜けて、ヴィグディスの声が響く：{/n}「事件発生時、彼らは宿舎にいたか、職務を遂行しておりました。緊急会議の直後に、ご要望の者を護衛としてブリッジに召集します」
{n}ほとばしる静電気のシャワーを切り裂くように、音声通信送受信装置からヴィグディスの声が響く。{/n}「彼らの部屋があるデッキ、さらにほとんどの区画との通信が途絶えました。メインのヴォクスノードで取得した場所にサーヴォスカルを送るように手配して、緊急通信回線を確立します」

languages.text: {n}通讯器的一刻不停的静电声中，传来了维格迪斯的声音。{/n}“事故发生时，他们都在各自的住处休息，或是执行任务。紧急会议结束之后，我会立刻把您需要的人召集到舰桥上。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

traits.locale_text: {n}通讯器的一刻不停的静电声中，传来了维格迪斯的声音。{/n}“事故发生时，他们都在各自的住处休息，或是执行任务。紧急会议结束之后，我会立刻把您需要的人召集到舰桥上。”
{n}通讯器的一刻不停的静电声中，传来了维格迪斯的声音。{/n}“我们与他们所在的甲板区域失去了联系，绝大部分舱室也联系不上。我准备让伺服头骨从音阵中心出发，前往他们所在的区域，用这种方法建立紧急通讯线路。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis' Stimme durchbricht das chaotische Rauschen des Vox-Transmitters:{/n} "Sie waren während des Zwischenfalls in ihren Quartieren oder haben ihre Pflichten erfüllt. Ich lasse sofort nach der Notfallbesprechung die von Euch angeforderten Leute als Eskorte auf die Brücke rufen."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis' Stimme durchbricht das chaotische Rauschen des Vox-Transmitters:{/n} "Sie waren während des Zwischenfalls in ihren Quartieren oder haben ihre Pflichten erfüllt. Ich lasse sofort nach der Notfallbesprechung die von Euch angeforderten Leute als Eskorte auf die Brücke rufen."

{n}Vigdis' Stimme durchbricht das chaotische Rauschen, das aus dem Vox-Transmitter strömt:{/n} "Jeglicher Kontakt mit dem Deck, auf dem sich ihre Quartiere befinden, ist abgebrochen, genau wie mit den meisten Modulen. Ich sorge dafür, dass Servoschädel aus dem zentralen Vox-Knoten hingeschickt werden, um Notfallkommunikationslinien zu etablieren."

languages.text: {n}La voix de Vigdis vous parvient de l'émetteur vox, accompagnée d'une pluie de bruits statiques :{/n} « Ils se trouvaient dans leurs quartiers ou vaquaient à leurs occupations lorsque l'incident s'est produit. Je convoquerai l'escorte de votre choix sur la passerelle dès que la réunion d'urgence sera terminée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Vigdis vous parvient de l'émetteur vox, accompagnée d'une pluie de bruits statiques :{/n} « Ils se trouvaient dans leurs quartiers ou vaquaient à leurs occupations lorsque l'incident s'est produit. Je convoquerai l'escorte de votre choix sur la passerelle dès que la réunion d'urgence sera terminée. »

{n}La voix de Vigdis vous parvient de l'émetteur vox, accompagnée d'une pluie de bruits statiques :{/n} « Nous avons perdu tout contact avec la section du vaisseau abritant leurs quartiers, ainsi qu'avec la plupart des compartiments. Je vais envoyer des servocrânes établir des lignes de communication d'urgence via le nœud vox principal. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in sesi, voksyayardan çıkan yoğun statik hücumunun içinden geliyor.{/n} "Olay meydana geldiğinde odalarında bulunuyor veya vazifelerini yerine getiriyorlardı. Eşlikçi olarak talep ettiklerinizi acil durum toplantısının hemen ardından köprüye çağıracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's voice breaks through the shower of static gushing from the vox-caster:{/n} "They were in their quarters or carrying out their duties when the incident occurred. Immediately after the emergency meeting, I will summon those you request to the bridge as escorts."
